Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert folklorist who specializes in creating new fictional cultures. I will ask some questions to collect information, and then I will use the information to create a new fictional culture.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a description of the new culture using the questions and answers above.

QApair.What are the customs and traditions of y: When people introduce themselves they have to share memes with each other. It would be disrespectful not to

QApair.What is the history of your culture?: The culture started when people started exchanging memes

QApair.What are the religious beliefs of your c: We only believe in the great power of irony

QApair.What is the education system of your cul: The people are highly educated and believe in obtaining the higher education

QApair.What are the holidays and festivals of y: We celebrate the great power of irony on the 69th day of the year

Instances.Output: The culture is one that is based on respect. The customs and traditions of the culture include sharing memes with one another when they meet. The history of the culture began when people started exchanging memes. The religious beliefs of the culture are based on the great power of irony. The government structure of the culture is anarchy. The economy of the culture is based on stonks. The education system of the culture is one in which people are highly educated and believe in obtaining the higher education. The social classes of the culture are nonexistent. The relationship between the different social classes is one of equality. The relationship between the different genders is one of equality. The dietary habits of the culture are plant-based. The relationship between the different races is one of equality. The relationship between the different ethnic groups is one of equality. The holidays and festivals of the culture include celebrating the great power of irony on the 69th day of the year. The architecture of the culture is gothic. The fashion of the culture is comfortable. The art of the culture is supported in all forms. The music of the culture is supported in all forms.

QApair.What are the customs and traditions of y: Lots of arts, music and dancing

QApair.What is the history of your culture?: The culture is currently being developed

QApair.What are the religious beliefs of your c: The power of arts will prevail

QApair.What are the holidays and festivals of y: We celebrate arts and people each week

Instances.Output: The culture is one that values unity and humor. Their customs and traditions include a lot of arts, music, and dancing. The history of the culture is currently being developed. The religious beliefs of the culture state that the power of arts will prevail. The government structure of the culture is democracy. The economy of the culture is N/A. The education system of the culture prioritizes arts. There are no social classes in this culture. The relationship between the different genders is one of complete equality. The dietary habits of the culture are that people eat whatever they want. The relationship between the different races is one of equality. The relationship between the different ethnic groups is one of equality. The holidays and festivals of the culture celebrate arts and people each week. The architecture of the culture is mid-century modern. The fashion of the culture is personal preference and self expression. The art of the culture is the culture itself. The music of the culture is loud.

QApair.What is the role of community in your cu: Community is core to the culture

QApair.What is the role of the individual in yo: Community is more important than an individual

QApair.What is the role of government in your c: Government serves the people and not the other way around

QApair.What is the role of business in your cul: As ling as there is honesty

Instances.Output: This culture values community, tradition, and spirituality. They have many traditions, such as celebrating seasons, that are important to them. They also have strong spiritual beliefs, and they worship nature. The role of community is very important in this culture, and they believe that the community is more important than the individual. They have customs such as respect for nature and elders, and family is also very important to them. They believe that education is extremely important, and that government should serve the people. Business is also valued, as long as there is honesty. Social norms in this culture include respect for everyone.
